Interfaces

AttachmentInterface

Inherits from ScriptInterface

States:
  • attach_on_reset bool true
Inputs:
  • attachment ReferenceFramePtr 0
Parameters:
  • position Position 0
Methods:
  • attach -> attached
  • detach -> detached

BooleanLogicInterface

Inherits from EvaluatorInterface

Targets:
  • on_true
  • on_false
Inputs:
  • LHS bool false
  • RHS bool false
Outputs:
  • Result bool false
Methods:
  • trigger -> triggered

CameraBehaviorInterface

States:
  • start_on_reset bool false
  • pause_on_reset bool false
  • enable_on_reset bool false
Inputs:
  • linked_cameras CAMERA_INSTANCE
Parameters:
  • behavior_name String NULL
  • priority int 0
  • threshold float 1.0f
  • blend_in float 1.0f
  • duration float -1.0f
  • blend_out float 1.0f
Methods:
  • enable -> enabled
  • disable -> disabled
  • activate_behavior -> behavior_activated
  • deactivate_behavior -> behavior_deactivated
  • reset -> reseted

CloseableInterface

Inherits from ScriptInterface

States:
  • open_on_reset bool false
Methods:
  • open -> opened
  • close -> closed

CompositeInterface

Inherits from AttachmentInterface

States:
  • is_template bool false
  • local_only bool false
  • suspend_on_reset bool false
  • deleted bool false
  • is_shared bool false
  • requires_script_for_current_gen bool true
  • requires_script_for_next_gen bool true
  • convert_to_physics bool false
  • delete_standard_collision bool false
  • delete_ballistic_collision bool false
Parameters:
  • disable_display bool false
  • disable_collision bool false
  • disable_simulation bool false
  • mapping FilePath NULL
  • include_in_planar_reflections bool false
Methods:
  • show -> shown
  • hide -> hidden
  • enable -> enabled
  • disable -> disabled
  • simulate -> simulating
  • keyframe -> keyframed
  • suspend -> suspended
  • allow -> allowed

EvaluatorInterface

Inherits from InspectorInterface

GateInterface

Inherits from ScriptInterface

States:
  • open_on_reset bool false
  • lock_on_reset bool false
Methods:
  • open -> opened
  • close -> closed
  • lock -> locked
  • unlock -> unlocked

GateResourceInterface

Inherits from ScriptInterface

Targets:
  • gate_status_changed
Inputs:
  • request_open_on_reset bool false
  • request_lock_on_reset bool false
  • force_open_on_reset bool false
  • force_close_on_reset bool false
  • is_auto bool false
  • auto_close_delay float 0.0
Outputs:
  • is_open bool false
  • is_locked bool false
  • gate_status int 0
Methods:
  • request_open -> requested_open
  • request_close -> requested_clos
  • request_lock -> requested_lock
  • request_unlock -> requested_unlock
  • force_open -> forced_open
  • force_close -> forced_close
  • request_restore -> requested_restore
  • refresh -> refreshed
  • trigger -> triggered

GetComponentInterface

Inherits from EvaluatorInterface

Inputs:
  • Input Direction 0.0,0.0,0.0
Outputs:
  • Result float 0.0f
Methods:
  • trigger -> triggered

InspectorInterface

Inherits from ScriptInterface

Methods:
  • trigger -> triggered

ModifierInterface

Inherits from InspectorInterface

ProxyInterface

Inherits from ScriptInterface

States:
  • proxy_filter_targets bool false

Methods:
  • proxy_enable -> proxy_enabled
  • proxy_disable -> proxy_disabled

ScriptInterface

States:
  • delete_me bool false
Parameters:
  • name String NULL

  • resume -> resumed

SmokeCylinderAttachmentInterface

Inherits from SensorAttachmentInterface
